radiographic_examinations.findings: Hepatic parenchyma appears within normal limits; 1-cm echogenic round focus in the left hepatic lobe possibly representing hemangioma or focal fat; mild intrahepatic biliary dilation; CBD measuring 8 mm with several obstructing stones, largest measuring 1.3 cm; gallbladder markedly distended with numerous gallstones; pancreas appears within normal limits; normal echogenicity of spleen and kidneys.
